ESRS S1 paragraph AR 56 specifies that ‘the definitions of permanent, temporary, non-guaranteed
hours . . . employees differ between countries . . .’ and it also provides a definition of non-
guaranteed hours employees. While permanent and temporary employment relationships define
the duration of a contract, a non-guaranteed hours contract refers mainly to the expected working
